Data Manipulation and Visualization with R

This document excerpt provides an overview of data manipulation and visualization techniques using the dplyr library in R. It covers various functions such as filter(), arrange(), mutate(), summarize(), group_by(), and ggplot(). The examples demonstrate how to select, sort, update, and summarize datasets, as well as create scatter plots and visualize median GDP per capita by year.

Key Concepts:

  • Data filtering and manipulation
  • Data visualization with ggplot2
  • Data analysis with dplyr
  • Grouping data for summary statistics
ggplot2 dplyr filter arrange mutate summarize group_by
